A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the movie overall was good. I liked the characters Finn and Rose but their subplot was the weakest part of the movie. I also didn't like Leia using the force and surviving in space. I know Carrie Fisher is now dead and the movie tried to be a tribute to her but her character should have died right there. Kylo Ren and Rey were very good characters and I loved Snoke's demise. I didn't think Luke's portrayal was too unfaithful\, I would have changed some things but overall I thought it was good. I enjoyed the movie and I'm excited to see what the next one holds.
